thread.title_full: Amazon: Tula Ergonomic Carrier Only $119.20 Shipped (Regularly $149)

author: Angela (Super Saver Sidekick)
title: Amazon: Tula Ergonomic Carrier Only $119.20 Shipped (Regularly $149)
text:
Head on over to Amazon.com where they are offering up this highly rated Tula Ergonomic Carrier for only $119.20 shipped (regularly $149). There are lots of great patterns and colors to choose from at this price. For comparison, Target.com is currently selling this same item for $149.99.
This carrier can be used in both front and back to carry little ones from 15-45 pounds. It is comfortable and easy to use and is machine washable. It includes features such as dual-adjustment straps to allow for the perfect fit, additional leg-opening and shoulder padding, and a large pocket on the contouring hip belt for additional storage. Each carrier comes with a removable hood to support babyâ€™s head while asleep, protect from sun or wind, and allow for comfortable breastfeeding.
(Thanks Libby!)
